metadata.synopsis: Appears if the player tries to speak to the Displacer Beast. The player can learn that the beast is in love with the Orthon, and if they know that it has been charmed by him, they can attempt to convince it to join them in battle against the Orthon.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Attempt to speak to the Displacer Beast. S_SHA_Displacer Default location (-677; 0; -785)

0.speaker: Displacer Beast
0.text: What was that? I feel strange... clear.

53.speaker: Displacer Beast
53.text: Leave. Before I get hungry again.

105.speaker: Displacer Beast
105.text: I hope they chew him up in the Hells.

118.speaker: Displacer Beast
118.text: What business do you have in my master's den?

77.speaker: Displacer Beast
77.text: I could ask you the same question.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: I could ask you the same question.

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *You smell sour milk and rot on its breath.*
51.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *The back of your eye tingles - there's magic in the beast's gut.*
18.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

98.speaker: Narrator
98.text: *This creature has been eating charmed spider meat.*
98.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: The orthon sold you to me. I'm your master now.
63.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

141.speaker: Displacer Beast
141.text: You? But master loves me... master lied?
141.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

108.speaker: Displacer Beast
108.text: You? But master loves me... master lied?
108.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is shocked - it has been blindly following its master out of love and adoration and now its illusion is shattered.

30.speaker: Displacer Beast
30.text: My claws itch, my blood burns.

54.speaker: Displacer Beast
54.text: False master! Hind-legged liars, all! I'll shred you.
54.context: NodeContext: Irrational with rage, extremely triggered

8.speaker: Player
8.text: The only liar here is your 'master'. Let's end him together.

27.speaker: Displacer Beast
27.text: I'll not start the fight but I'll help you end it.
27.context: InternalNodeContext: Beginning to reckon with the truth, the beast begins to turn toward anger - though it can't get over its amorous feelings for the orthon. It's been charmed for too long.

55.text: Bold words, prey. But I kill who I please.

9.speaker: Displacer Beast
9.text: Bold words, prey. But I kill who I please.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Stop your mewling before I shred you.

113.speaker: Displacer Beast
113.text: I've a wounded pride. Leave me to nurse it.

64.speaker: Displacer Beast
64.text: I've a wounded pride. Leave me to nurse it.

74.text: I don't answer to you, prey.

114.speaker: Displacer Beast
114.text: I don't answer to you, prey.

97.text: You lie. Your breath stinks of double-speak.

20.speaker: Displacer Beast
20.text: You lie. Your breath stinks of double-speak.

127.speaker: Player
127.text: You only love your master because he's been dosing this meat. He's manipulating you.
127.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is initially outraged, but your logic is infallible, and awakens thoughts and feelings it has buried for a long time with the help of the charm potion.

94.speaker: Displacer Beast
94.text: I remember... quick flesh, hot blood.
94.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is initially outraged, but your logic is infallible, and awakens thoughts and feelings it has buried for a long time with the help of the charm potion.

87.speaker: Displacer Beast
87.text: I remember... quick flesh, hot blood.
87.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast is initially outraged, but your logic is infallible, and awakens thoughts and feelings it has buried for a long time with the help of the charm potion.

143.speaker: Displacer Beast
143.text: Before master, my prey was alive.

42.text: What master gives is my rightful due. Master is most kind.

102.speaker: Displacer Beast
102.text: What master gives is my rightful due. Master is most kind.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Master? Didn't think of your kind as slaves.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

23.speaker: Displacer Beast
23.text: Slave? You dare call master's heart-jewel a slave?
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

78.speaker: Displacer Beast
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

90.speaker: Player
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

67.speaker: Displacer Beast
67.text: I was belly-hollow - close to death.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

129.speaker: Displacer Beast
129.text: Master found me, fed me, then I... I...
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast looks confused - it appears to have forgotten how its story ends.InternalNodeContext: The beast can't (or won't) remember being charmed.

128.speaker: Displacer Beast
128.text: I love him. And he loves me.
128.context: NodeContext: grasping for something it knows to be true

45.speaker: Player
45.text: You're in love with an orthon?

43.speaker: Displacer Beast
43.text: Not just any orthon. Master is the darkest of desire. None compare to him.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I doubt he loves you back.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Though the beast enjoys a good flirt, it's toying with you - it finds you unconvincing and unappealing.

10.speaker: Displacer Beast
10.text: Master is most generous with his meat-gifts. The rot is only skin-shallow. The kicks he gives, most earned.

133.speaker: Displacer Beast
133.text: This is love. I am sure.

140.speaker: Player
140.text: Love is a disease like any other.

92.speaker: Displacer Beast
92.text: Disease? No. Love is a birthright. I pity the beast who is deprived.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Would he die for you, as you would for him?

14.speaker: Displacer Beast
14.text: I need no sign. My belly is full, my spirit fed. Your words are not wanted here.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I have a servant who calls me Master, and his love disgusts me.

57.speaker: Displacer Beast
57.text: Poor servant, poor poor servant. My master would never be so cruel.

109.speaker: Player
109.context: InternalNodeContext: Though the beast enjoys a good flirt, it's toying with you - it finds you unconvincing and unappealing.

86.speaker: Displacer Beast
86.text: I know my tastes. And I'm not known for sharing.

131.speaker: Player
131.text: You should consider me - I'm much better than him.
131.context: InternalNodeContext: Though the beast enjoys a good flirt, it's toying with you - it finds you unconvincing and unappealing.

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *The creature eyes you with vague interest...*
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Though the beast enjoys a good flirt, it's toying with you - it finds you unconvincing and unappealing.

95.speaker: Player
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

71.speaker: Displacer Beast
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

81.speaker: Displacer Beast
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

35.speaker: Player
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

101.speaker: Player
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

65.speaker: Narrator
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

79.speaker: Narrator
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly stifles a laugh. (Emotion key, not animation)

32.speaker: Displacer Beast
32.context: InternalNodeContext: The displacer beast is not impressed. She finds you irritating.

110.text: *You try to hold it in, but that only makes it worse.*
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly attempting to stifle a laugh. The displacer beast is furious.

139.speaker: Narrator
139.text: *You try to hold it in, but that only makes it worse.*
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player visibly attempting to stifle a laugh. The displacer beast is furious.

136.speaker: Displacer Beast
136.text: Imbecile. I shall make dust of your bones.

91.speaker: Displacer Beast
91.text: That's between me and master. Go sniff elsewhere, prey.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Live and let love, I suppose.

41.speaker: Displacer Beast
41.text: Very much. Now get out of our territory.

68.speaker: Player
68.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast considers the player for its next meal.

70.speaker: Narrator
70.context: InternalNodeContext: The beast considers the player for its next meal.

119.speaker: Displacer Beast
119.text: Shame to let a meal walk free...
119.context: InternalNodeContext: Like a cat taunting a mouse, its hunger and lust are palpable...

138.speaker: Displacer Beast
138.text: ...But you don't appeal to my tastes.
138.context: InternalNodeContext: ... Until it becomes apparent that it's toying with you.

123.speaker: Displacer Beast
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

126.speaker: Displacer Beast
126.text: Why are you still in master's den?
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

134.speaker: Displacer Beast
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Something doesn't seem quite right - take a closer look.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *Light seems to bend around the beast's body.*

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *Light seems to bend around the beast's body.*

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *It's a displacer beast - alone, and tame.*

99.text: *There's something off about this creature, but you can't tell what.*

104.speaker: Narrator
104.text: *There's something off about this creature, but you can't tell what.*

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Something doesn't seem quite right - take a closer look.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: Something doesn't seem quite right - take a closer look.
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Something doesn't seem quite right - take a closer look.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Make eye contact with the beast.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

111.speaker: Narrator
111.text: *Though its posture is defensive, its eyes are soft - the beast is in love.*
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

80.speaker: Narrator
80.text: *Though its posture is defensive, its eyes are soft - the beast is in love.*
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Give it a scratch behind the ears.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

11.speaker: Narrator
11.text: *The beast purrs as it enjoys your touch...*
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player scritches the Displacer Beast behind its ears, which the beast enjoys.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *...But only for a moment - it's not your affection it craves.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The beast haughtily turns its attention away from the player.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Reach out to stroke one of its tentacles.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player reaches out to stroke one of the beast's tentacles. The beast lets out a shudder of pleasure.

117.speaker: Narrator
117.text: *The beast shudders - a moment of pleasure...*
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player reaches out to stroke one of the beast's tentacles. The beast lets out a shudder of pleasure.

145.speaker: Narrator
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Show player looking disappointedInternalNodeContext: The beast is guilty - by enjoying your touch, it feels like it's betraying its master.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Look around to see who it might be in love with.

124.speaker: Narrator
124.text: *A few merregons and an orthon - could the beast really be infatuated with one of these creatures?*

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *A few merregons and an orthon - could the beast really be infatuated with one of these creatures?*

107.text: *You see nothing nearby that might appeal to a displacer beast's desires.*

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *You see nothing nearby that might appeal to a displacer beast's desires.*

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Check the ground for signs of other paw prints.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player checks the ground

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *The only paw prints you can see belong to the beast itself - it has neither mate nor litter.*
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player checks the ground

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *The only paw prints you can see belong to the beast itself - it has neither mate nor litter.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player checks the ground

39.text: *There are too many prints - you cannot tell them apart.*
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player checks the ground

132.speaker: Narrator
132.text: *There are too many prints - you cannot tell them apart.*
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player checks the ground

33.text: *Try as you might, you can't seem to meet the beast's eyes.*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The displacement effect of the beast prevents the player from making eye contact.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Try as you might, you can't seem to meet the beast's eyes.*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The displacement effect of the beast prevents the player from making eye contact.
